articles.title: Unseeded Opelka upsets Tsitsipas to earn spot in National Bank Open final - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: American Reilly Opelka is through to the finals at the National Bank Open in Toronto after upsetting Stefanos Tsitsipas of Greece 6(2)-7, 7-6(4), 6-4 on Saturday.
articles.content:
Persistent pressure was the key for Reilly Opelka at the National Bank Open in Toronto on Saturday.
The unseeded American outlasted No. 3 seed Stefanos Tsitsipas of Greece through a marathon two-hou… [+5139 chars]

articles.author: John Matisonn
articles.title: John Matisonn | Taliban sweeps through Afghanistan - American politicians have failed the country - News24
articles.description: US President Joe Biden understands that failure in Afghanistan is just one example of the failure of the political class to address increasingly urgent priorities – from climate change to infrastructure, writes John Matisonn.
